scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT
     modelname='staff',
     idpersona=o.IdPersona,
     [name]=o.Persona,
     isactive = o.Operativo,
     isinternal = o.Interno,
     cf=o.CF,
     birthdate=o.DataNascita,
     birthplace=o.LuogoNascita,
     tel=o.Telefono,
     mobile=o.Cellulare,
     [address]=o.Indirizzo,
     city=o.Comune,
     region=o.Provincia,
     zip=o.CAP
   FROM CantierePersone as o',
